original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
8.2. Sahetukaduka
Hetu
Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagataṁ
analyzed: ▁na s ahetu kaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na s ahetu ko ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁vicikicchā saha gat aṃ

original: uddhaccasahagataṁ mohaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo
mahābhūtā …pe… dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ
rūpaṁ kaṭattārūpaṁ upādārūpaṁ. Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: ▁rūpaṃ ▁kaṭattā rūp aṃ ▁upādārūp aṃ ▁na s ahetu kaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na ahetu ko ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati

analyzed: ▁hetupaccayā ▁vicikicchā saha gat aṃ ▁uddhaccasahagat aṃ ▁moh aṃ ▁paṭicca ▁sampayutt akā ▁khandhā

original: ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.
(Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)

original: Hetu-ārammaṇa
